topic.title: DITA Map to PDF - CSS HTML5 Customization

body.p: comes bundled with the DITA Open Toolkit that provides a mechanism for converting DITA maps to PDF output. includes a built-in DITA Map to PDF - CSS HTML5 transformation scenario that convert DITA maps to PDF using a CSS-based processing engine and HTML5 layout pages.

There are several methods that can be used to customize DITA to PDF output:
Define the layout using a PDF Publishing Template.
Create a customization CSS and reference it in the transformation scenario (using the args.css parameter).
Create a DITA Open Toolkit plugin that adds extensions to the PDF output. More details can be found in the DITA Open Toolkit Documentation.
